title: A New Kind of Ranching Is Taking Its Place at the Ponderosa!

tasks.task: Check and tend to the big joe herd.
subtasks: Drive to the burn unit to check on the herd.
Bring hay to the big joe herd.
Distribute hay (native and alfalfa) to the herd.
Roll out hay in different areas to maximize coverage and encourage grazing.

tasks.task: Develop and implement a plan to increase wild turkey population in the area.
subtasks: Purchase and incubate wild turkey eggs.
Acclimate and maintain wild turkeys in a mobile unit for rotational grazing.
Construct a mobile turkey pen using a Happy Farmer-sponsored unit.
Move wild turkeys into the new mobile pen.
Secure turkeys in the pen, managing their movement and handling.
Set up roosting bars and potential water systems in the pen.

tasks.task: Prepare newly cleaned ponds for bison grazing.
subtasks: Clean and maintain a pond to provide water for bison.
Rotate bison to the newly prepared pasture with access to clean water.
